summary: SummaryHighlightsVeganGive BackKISS presents The New Natural False Eyelashes, a lash collection, designed for a "no makeup, makeup" aesthetic. This trend is about flawlessly imperfect lashes, featuring uneven, sparsely distributed lash patterns and a thinner lash band for a remarkably natural effect.
details: DetailsFeaturesEasy to apply, comfortable, effortless minimal lookThe lash lift effect emphasizes a longer and fuller lash lookVegan & contact lens friendlyItem 2619127How To UseHow to Apply:Check fit: Lay lash on top of your natural lash. Trim if needed.Apply KISS Strip Lash Adhesive (sold separately) to lash band; wait 30 seconds for adhesive to become slightly clear and tacky.Apply lashes along natural lash line. Hold, allowing adhesive to dry completely.Precautions: Keep out of reach of childrenIngredientsSynthetic Fibers
how_to_use: How to Apply:Check fit: Lay lash on top of your natural lash. Trim if needed.Apply KISS Strip Lash Adhesive (sold separately) to lash band; wait 30 seconds for adhesive to become slightly clear and tacky.Apply lashes along natural lash line. Hold, allowing adhesive to dry completely.Precautions: Keep out of reach of children

reviews.headline: Pretty but lash band is annoying
reviews.comments: Love the lashes but the adhesive that comes with the lashes is so annoying even if I put black glue you can see the clear band

reviews.headline: Too bulky
reviews.comments: Picked these up on a whim. Granted I have smaller East Asian eyes, but these made my eyes droop even more. The clear band is still very visible after eyeliner, etc.

reviews.headline: I had high hopes
reviews.comments: These were very pretty inside the packaging but once they're on they're too thick and you can see the clear lash band.

reviews.headline: Cute but too stiff
reviews.comments: I am a super kiss lash fan but these lashes are labeled as natural but the band is to thick and not flexible.

reviews.headline: I recommend if you are going for a cute lash only
reviews.comments: The style is cute, unfortunatelt uncomfortable due to how thick the band is. I had to return them

reviews.headline: never looking back to other lashes, these are the best!
reviews.comments: I get these every 1-2 months, these are absolutely the best but I have one problem, sometimes in the packaging they get bent incorrectly causing some of the lashes to go a bit wonky so then I don't use one of the pairs, I also wish they could be reused more, mine tend to collect oil really fast causing the lashes to look a bit messy but that could just be user error!! Enough of the bad, time for the good! I get the wide slacks and they look exactly like the eyelashes I used to have, I used to have really long lashes but I have trichotillomania which is a disorder where I pull out my hair so I no longer have eyelashes or eyebrows but back in the day when I did have them, these eyelashes resemble as such! My disorder is really confidence draining but these eyelashes make me feel so good and confident about myself so I'm very thankful for them! They are a bit stiff out of the package (like most new lashes) so I recommend kind of grabbing either end and just bending it so it makes an arch shape, make your lashes do yoga haha! When I first got them, I didn't really know how to put on lashes but there is a wrong and right way! if you put them on wrong, they can appear flat and not lifting but if you do it right, they'll be long and lifted! I followed Brooke Monks tutorial on how she puts on her lashes and it worked perfectly for the wide slacks!! 10/10 recommend these!

reviews.headline: Band too thick
reviews.comments: These lashes look good once you get them on, but the band is way too thick.

reviews.headline: Pretty but didn't come with glue.
reviews.comments: These lashes were fine once I got them applied. They were soft and not too heavy.

reviews.headline: Lashes
reviews.comments: Great price bought as a gift for my granddaughter she loved to use these she also uses them on family members love the length. If you are looking for non natural looking length these might not be for you

reviews.headline: 10/10 sooooo good
reviews.comments: these lashes r sooooo amazing. reusable up to 10 times without them falling apart, look so cute and are so versatile depending on application angle, can be thick and voluminous or thin and natural, thing band and overall some of my fav lashes !

reviews.headline: Thick band ruined it :(
reviews.comments: The style is beautiful, it looks soooo good not too dramatic just perfect. But I agree with everyone complaining about the band, it's too thick it makes it hard to apply. Also feel like the clear band is very easy to see once it's applied

reviews.headline: Like
reviews.comments: I liked them. Had to cut down a little, but thats expected. Very light.

reviews.headline: These are my favorite day lashes to wear!
reviews.comments: They are thick and black they give a nice soft look with a long lash. I'm obsessed.

reviews.headline: Favorite lashes
reviews.comments:
I'm not sure why there's so many bad reviews on these. I tried these out for myself a while ago in the style "pearl earring" and they are my go to. 
I have small eyes so its hard for me to find a lash that looks more "natural" to my eye shape because most will still look dramatic on me. 
These have an invisible lash band and give you just enough to add to a minimal look and you want to spruce it up a bit. I especially think these are good price point for someone just getting into lashes.

reviews.headline: Perfect lashes! Don't believe the negative reviews!
reviews.comments: Nude blazer are the perfect natural looking lashes. Yes, the band is thick and stiff but with a little work and the use of a tool, Application is a breeze, Giving a beautiful lifted effect! Long lasting! I've kept these lashes on throughout the entire weekend!

reviews.headline: A mess
reviews.comments:
If possible, Id give it a 0/5 stars. I bought this thinking its cute, and it is, but theres a couple issues with it:
All the lashes in the 5 pack all vary in thickness, the band is not thin in the slightest, no matter what you do it will stab your eye, and I got only one lash for the left eye; the other 9 were for the right. I heard that kiss lashes had deteriorated in quality, but i didnt think itd be this bad. Dont buy it.

reviews.headline: Beautiful lashes but cheap band!
reviews.comments: Was excited for these to be my ride or die false lashes going forward. The lashes look high quality but then they completely dropped the ball on the band. It's thick and stiff and wouldnt contour to everyone's eyes so eventually lifts.

reviews.headline: Beautiful lashes
reviews.comments: I love the design and the flexibility of the lashes makes it easy to apply on my lashes. Definitely repurchase again.

reviews.headline: No
reviews.comments: Product was hard and really stiff

reviews.headline: Absolute must have
reviews.comments: I carry these in my kit ALWAYS.

faceoff_positive.comments: I get these every 1-2 months, these are absolutely the best but I have one problem, sometimes in the packaging they get bent incorrectly causing some of the lashes to go a bit wonky so then I don't use one of the pairs, I also wish they could be reused more, mine tend to collect oil really fast causing the lashes to look a bit messy but that could just be user error!! Enough of the bad, time for the good! I get the wide slacks and they look exactly like the eyelashes I used to have, I used to have really long lashes but I have trichotillomania which is a disorder where I pull out my hair so I no longer have eyelashes or eyebrows but back in the day when I did have them, these eyelashes resemble as such! My disorder is really confidence draining but these eyelashes make me feel so good and confident about myself so I'm very thankful for them! They are a bit stiff out of the package (like most new lashes) so I recommend kind of grabbing either end and just bending it so it makes an arch shape, make your lashes do yoga haha! When I first got them, I didn't really know how to put on lashes but there is a wrong and right way! if you put them on wrong, they can appear flat and not lifting but if you do it right, they'll be long and lifted! I followed Brooke Monks tutorial on how she puts on her lashes and it worked perfectly for the wide slacks!! 10/10 recommend these!
faceoff_positive.headline: never looking back to other lashes, these are the best!

faceoff_negative.comments: Super fluffy and lightweight. Band is clear. Not practical for everyday UNLESS you have big beautiful eyes! They were way too big for my liking but every other aspect I really liked.  KISS always makes lashes affordable and so I appreciate the value the bigger pack gives. Personally, I'd go for something smaller but with the same subtlety. Overall great brand and great lightweight BIG lash if that's what you're searching for. The glue is also super. Held onto the lashes and my lash line with no primer. I also have very oily eyelids so I was very impressed. It also dried clear so huge benefit.
faceoff_negative.headline: Lightweight, BIG fluttery lashes
